alert.note: Alert for Caswell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Caswell County through 645 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Topnot, or near Yanceyville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yanceyville... Jericho... Prospect Hill... Camp Springs... Milton... Blanch... and Leasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
